entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -30.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -34.8°C
Wind: W 34 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
